channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IN

item.title: Report X-2024051292
item.description:
Report X-2024051292

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-05T15:12:36+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-16
  • City: PLAINFIELD
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED OVER TO THE BELT, WHERE THE SUPERVISOR NOTIFIED RESPONDER THERE WAS POWDER LEAKING FROM THE CORNER OF THE BOX. RATHER THAN OPEN IT ON THE BELT, RESPONDER ELECTED TO BRING IT BACK TO THE CAGE FOR CLOSER EXAMINATION. ONCE THE BOX WAS OPEN, IT WAS CLEAR THAT THE LID OF THE SIX-GALLON BUCKET WAS LOOSE. RESPONDER PROCEEDED TO DAMAGE OUT PACKAGE

item.title: Report X-2024050949
item.description:
Report X-2024050949

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-03T15:13:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-25
  • City: PLAINFIELD
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DAMAGE INSPECTION; NON REGULATED MOTOR OIL LEAKED; NO LEAK TO HAZARDOUS MATERIAL PRODUCTS. IN PROCESS OF REPACK, INNER CARTON BORE A LTD QTY LABEL. RESPONDER CALLED HELPDESK. NO SPILLAGE. CORROSIVE LIQUID, ACIDIC, INORGANIC, N.O.S. / PAINT INNER BOX MARKED WITH THE LTD QTY MARKING
